##### I am an Assistant Professor *("Ricercatore in Tenure Track")* in the Department of Economics and Finance at Tor Vergata University of Rome.  

</br>

I am a Research Fellow at <a href="https://ceistorvergata.it/" style="font-weight: normal;">CEIS</a>.

I received my PhD in Economics from New York University in 2024. 

I am a macroeconomist with interests in the fields of macro-finance, international economics and monetary economics. 

Click [here](content/cv.pdf) for my CV.

</br>
